it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.udp

Class UdpLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.udp.UdpLayer

  • public class UdpLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    UDP layer sends and receives UDP datagrams. Incoming datagrams are dispached to the proper UDP port listener.
